greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Main diagonal of square table A086620 of coefficients, T(n,k), of x^n*y^k in f(x,y) that satisfies f(x,y) = 1/(1-x-y) + xy*f(x,y)^2.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
formula: a(n) = Sum_{j=0..n} binomial(n,j) * binomial(2*n-j,n) * binomial(2*j,j)/(j+1). - _Andrew Howroyd_, Apr 11 2021
program: (PARI) a(n) = {sum(j=0, n, binomial(n,j)*binomial(2*n-j, n)*binomial(2*j, j)/(j+1))} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Apr 11 2021
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jul 24 2003
ext: Terms a(18) and beyond from _Andrew Howroyd_, Apr 11 2021
